section.name: SPOCS Trust List
section.p:
The SPOCS Trusted List is the central component of the SPOCS infrastructure and distributed services. It provides the trust relation of the service nodes and enables addressing for the SPOCS building blocks eDelivery, eServices and eSafe. The TL is a signed XML info set as specified by ETSI TS 102 231 and profiled in SPOCS deliverable D3.2 Appendix 2: Trust-Service status List profiling
To offer or invoke a SPOCS service, a provider needs an entry in this trusted list. The access is open and free of charge in general, but bound to policy adherence and mutual services provision of the participants.
The following document provides the SPOCS TL policies, the issuer and the participant are obligated to: SPOCS deliverable D3.2 Appendix 5: SPOCS TSL Accreditation and Operation Policy To get an entry in the SPCOS TL, please move to the section SPOCS TL and follow the instructions on “TL registration”.
